|brand = ZyXEL |model = NSA320 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 45-402-000120 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F1G08U0D-SCB0; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = DRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU128M8GE-AC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = FC:F5:28,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.19; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31.8;KW LSP release 5.1.3 patch 18;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA II |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.42 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J2 |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = fan, RTC w/ battery backup, |addchip = I2C Real Time Clock;NXP;8563T;;1;,,, USB 2.0 HUB Controller; Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, Enhanced OTP MCU;Holtek;HT46R065;;1;,,, ASIC;Atmel;ATL25/144;;1;,,, 2A, 23V Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;ZT7182S;;2;,,, 2A, 2V Non-Synchronous Buck Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS54231;;1;,,,, Dual D Flipâˆ’Flop with Set and Reset;NXP;74HC74D;;1;,,, Regulator;Catalyst Semiconductor;CAT7125S;;3;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = 1234 |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2010 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16822336015 |asin = B004UBU3SY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6281 ARM v5 @1.2GHz *RAM: 512MB DDR2 DRAM *Storage: 128MB NAND flash, 2x SATA II *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 3x USB 2.0 *Power Source: DC Jack 19V
==Links of Interest== * [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/32359-zyxel-nsa320-2-bay-power-media-server-reviewed '''ZyXEL NSA320 2-Bay Power Media Server''' on ''SmallNetBuilder''] * [https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/zyxel-nsa320 '''ZyXEL NSA320''' on ''archlinux|ARM'']
